posts.post_content:
Looking for PSA 1 or SGC 10 examples of either Blue Sleeves or 
Brown Sleeves. 

 While at the Italian-American club the discussion went in a direction
where I filled some old-timers in on the first major league player of 
Italian ancestry. They were fascinated when I showed them Eds 
Wikipedia page and would like to get a few of these gentlemen 
graded examples of Ed. Would consider raw cards as well but for these
guys I think graded works better.

Thanks,

Frank

If I had one, I would be glad to help. Also don't forget the other issues of the day including Sporting Life and T205. It's funny that I found Abbaticchio to be a tougher one when building the Monster. Even now when I buy lots to upgrade my set, I don't find either card in there very often.

Good suggestion - add Sporting Life or T205 as WTB cards.
Again, low grade by PSA or SGC.

Found one t205 on EBay - need a few more.

Thanks

I have a raw (brown sleeve) in a little better condition than you are asking for, but will post it anyway for your inspection.

I would let it go for $42, shipping incl.
